Title: Farmhand Freedom
Description:
Those Ordo yaungol are working my farmhands to death! It just ain't right.

Please, $c, save them before it's too late.
ObjectivesText: Free 12 Farmstead Slaves by killing Ordo Overseers.
CompletionText: Look, $g mister : lady;, I don't mean to be telling you your business, but I can still see a lot of my farmhands still out there.
RewardText:
Now ain't you just the thing?

Though, I guess it's not fair to force these here workers to stay with us, now that we don't have much work for 'em...
